metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1853 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
chrony before 1.31.1 does not properly protect state variables inauthenticated symmetric NTP associations, which allows remote attackerswith knowledge of NTP peering to cause a denial of service (inability tosynchronize) via random timestamps in crafted NTP data packets.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1853` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chrony - 2.1.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: chrony package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-1').
